circumstances: On final approach to Christiansted-Alexander Hamilton Airport, the twin engine airplane rolled to the left and descended until it crashed, bursting into flames. The aircraft was totally destroyed and all four occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Powerplant failure for undetermined reasons. The following contributing factors were reported:
- The pilot failed to follow approved procedures, 
- Improper emergency procedures, 
- Complete engine failure one engine, 
- Fuel boost pump found in off position, 
- Fuel selector to outboard tanks,
- Mixtures lean, 
- Propeller not feathered.
